mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, username, password, start_time, stop_time, status, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{startTime}, #{stopTime}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{lastUpdatedBy}, #{lastUpdateDate})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, start_time = #{startTime}, stop_time = #{stopTime}, status = #{status}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate} where id = #{id}
